title: Science experiment with 75 percent successful trials

content.description: In a certain science experiment, percent of trials are expected to be successful and  percent of trials are expected to be unsuccessful. The program below is intended to simulate the results of repeated trials of the experiment.
content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace  so that the simulation works as intended?

choices.label: RANDOM, open parenthesis 1 comma 100, close parenthesis, equals 25
RANDOM, open parenthesis 1 comma 100, close parenthesis, is less than or equal to 25
RANDOM, open parenthesis 1 comma 100, close parenthesis, equals 75
RANDOM, open parenthesis 1 comma 100, close parenthesis, is less than or equal to 75

content.answer: RANDOM, open parenthesis 1 comma 100, close parenthesis, is less than or equal to 75

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
